Test Name: Congenital Disorders of N-Glycosylation (CDG) Analysis, Serum
Purpose: To detect and characterize congenital disorders of N-glycosylation in patient serum samples.
Container: Red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: Centrifuge, vortex mixer, thermal cycler or water bath, and HPLC/UPLC system with fluorescence detector or MS/MS capabilities
